    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"

>
[Sixth Pillar Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=4078) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Hardcover](/Sources.aspx?ID=193) pg. 223, [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 77</row>

**Archetype** [Sixth Pillar](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=94)

**Prerequisites**
[Sixth Pillar Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2739)

</column>

---

You align your magical and physical potential. Whenever you succeed at an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strike against an opponent, they have a -1 status penalty to saves against your spells until the start of your next turn. Whenever you cast a spell using spell slots, you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed Strikes until the start of your next turn.
name: Sixth Pillar Mastery
